root.name: ZooZooGo!
root.description: OverviewZooZooGoo! is an collection of three cartoony animal themed puzzle games made by Big Head Games for PlayStation Mobile. The games are Treasure Hunt, a take on the classic match three game, Animahjong, mahjong solitaire against the clock, and Puzzle Quest, a variant of the sliding block puzzle.A follow-up game, called ZooZooGo! Worlds, is in development.
